profile.name: Rodion Bychkoviak
profile.position: Head of  UI/UX/Product Designer & Frontend Developer

about.title: About me
about.description: Head of Design with 13+ years in UI/UX and front-end. Led teams delivering complex digital products across fintech, e-commerce, casino and ERP. Strong in interface design, animation, branding and design systems. Combine creativity with technical precision and deep business and user understanding.

designSkills.title: Design skills
designSkills.description: I create large-scale token-based design systems with flexible component variations, themes, and adaptive states. I design interfaces that are clear at a glance, based on research and testing. Lead a project from idea to finished product, ensuring a consistent style and fast development speed.

devSkills.title: Development skills
devSkills.description: I develop fast, adaptive and reliable interfaces with clean code and well thought-out architecture. I know how to combine design and development so that the result looks flawless and works consistently. I optimize performance, implement modern technologies and ensure easy scalability of the project.

experienceCompany.title: Asvio Bank
experienceCompany.description: Launched a new mobile banking app amobank from scratch, combining strategy, design and development into a single ecosystem. Created a scalable design system with documentation that accelerated the team's work and ensured the visual integrity of the product. Led a small but highly effective design team that designed a user-friendly and intuitive interface with a full range of features: loans, deposits, mobile recharge, P2P and IBAN transfers, and other key services. Organized close interaction with developers and business analysts, which allowed to release the product in App Store and Google Play on time and without loss of quality. The application became an important tool for attracting and retaining clients.

experienceCompany.title: Brain Rockets
experienceCompany.description: Led a team of 6 designers, combining creativity and a systematic approach to product development. Generated concepts for new projects and created casual-style sketches on a tablet, setting visual direction. Organized work so that graphic designers turned ideas into final illustrations and UI/UX designers integrated them into layouts based on the design system, customizing them for the product. Ensured smooth communication within the team, allowing for the rapid launch of visually cohesive and technically sound projects.

experienceCompany.title: Gart Technologies
experienceCompany.position: Lead UI/UX Designer & Senior React Developer
experienceCompany.description: Managed a team of 3 designers and created interfaces of varying complexity, mostly for international markets. Realized about 10 major projects, including a cryptocurrency wallet and a government health-tech service for the UAE. Ensured a high level of design quality and adaptation to cultural and technical peculiarities of different markets. Organized the full cycle of work - from ideas and prototypes to finished layouts, which accelerated the launch and increased the competitiveness of products.

experienceCompany.title: Agroindustrial holding MHP
experienceCompany.position: Senior UI/UX Designer  & Middle React Developer
experienceCompany.description: Developed digital products for the company's internal and external use. One of the key projects was a system for Western partners, which allowed them to track containers with products in real time, including port and ship details. I created the design system and interface from scratch, as well as participated in React development, which ensured high performance and usability of the service. The project was highly appreciated by the management, for which he was awarded a bonus of two salaries. In parallel, he realized other projects: from lendings and promo pages for promotions to advertising banners, keeping the same style and high quality of workmanship.

experienceCompany.title: Bimp
experienceCompany.position: Senior Product Designer & Middle React Developer

The project was successfully brought to the market and continues to work steadily, bringing profit to the company and remaining a popular tool for clients.

experienceCompany.title: Renklod LDT
experienceCompany.position: Lead UI/UX / Web Designer & Lead Frontend Developer
experienceCompany.description: Joined the company as a Senior Designer and initiated a strategic decision to take outsourced development in-house. Formed a cross-functional team of 3 designers, 2 frontend and 1 backend developer. Under my leadership, the team improved 4 existing mono-brand stores and launched 7 more new stores, each with consistent and strong sales results. I provided the full cycle of product creation - from idea and design to launch and optimization, which significantly accelerated and improved the development of e-commerce direction of the company. At the same time, I grew as a specialist to the Lead level, learning not only to perform tasks, but also to distribute them among team members, to conduct reviews, to be a mentor and maintain team spirit.

At the same time, I developed full-cycle advertising lendings - from planning and design to front-end implementation, ensuring high conversion rate and visual integrity of the brand.
